name: Abstracker
description:
Catch the shapes before the timer reaches zero! Beat hi-scores with your own wits and reflexes! Draw a lasso by touching points in the screen. You don't need to drag, just click!

Capture the geometric shapes showing in the screen by drawing a lasso, and gain extra score by capturing them with a matching lasso shape. But don't let them touch your lasso before closing it, or else you'll lose time!

Also, watch out in closing the lasso correctly, crossed lines or lassoes closed without shapes will count as a miss!

IMPORTANT: This game has two versions: The free and premium version. The free version contains ads. If you don't want ads, you can download the Premium version by donating at least US$1.
